Key Match Events: Christian Eriksen scored and assisted a goal for Denmark in the win
Pierre-Emile Højbjerg scored an early goal from close range
Alexander Isak equalized for Sweden with a powerful shot
Joakim Mæhle had a chance in the box but no foul was called by VAR
Christian Eriksen scored the winning goal in the 85th minute
Pre-Game Insights: Demark continued their preparation for EURO 2024 with a win against rivals Sweden
The Danes were brimming with confidence after 13 wins from their previous 15 home games
Post-Match Reflections: Christian Eriksen was named Flashscore Man of the Match
Denmark will hope to add another morale-boosting victory before the Euros as they host Norway on Saturday
Sweden’s summer ends after their game at home to Serbia
Miscellaneous Highlights: The first goal was scored in the opening 90 seconds
The second half saw Denmark continue to press but also had quiet moments
Eriksen almost missed a golden chance in the 75th minute
Sweden had Jens Cajuste who threatened from distance but his shot was well blocked by Alexander Bah
